section.name: Related Documents plugin
section.p: The Related Documents plugin is a Hippo CMS 7 editor plugin by which you can pick docments that are related to the currently edited document. It has also the capability to create a list of suggested documents you may want to pick, based on matching metadata search.

subsection.name: Install instructions
subsection.p: Instructions on how to obtain and install the plugin can be found on the install page.

subsection.name: How it looks
subsection.p: To see how the Related Docs Plugin looks go the screenshots page

subsection.name: Project status
subsection.p: The latest version of the Related Docs Plugin is compatible with Hippo 7.9. Use earlier version range for previous Hippo versions. See the release notes for details.
